Inform 7 Write interactive fiction
Inform is a design system for interactive fiction based on natural language.
Interactive fiction is a literary form which involves programming a computer so that it presents a reader with a text which can be explored. Inform aims to make the burden of learning to program such texts as light as possible.
​ com.inform7.IDE.desktop http://inform7.com/ gnome-inform7
​
This is for the most part a maintenance release of Inform, incorporating fixes for nearly 300 issues reported with the previous build, but there are also minor language improvements.
